dcterms:description: The Geowiki dataset consists of crowd-sourced points of cropland and non-cropland points sampled around the world, with roughly 36,000 points each associated with a cropland probability score.
dcterms:title: Geowiki Dataset

dcterms:creator: A Markandya
dcterms:description: A dataset of evenly distributed points within Nigeria, labeled as cropland or non-cropland via photo-interpretation, used for training and validation of models.
dcterms:title: Nigeria Dataset

Martin Neuwirth

Clement Atzberger
Wai-Tim Ng
dcterms:description: Sentinel-1 and Sentinel-2 satellites provide data useful for vegetation monitoring and crop detection, with high resolution and frequent revisit times.
dcterms:title: Sentinel-1 and Sentinel-2 Data

dcterms:description: The Shuttle Radar Topography Mission (SRTM) provides digital elevation model data, which is useful for topographic analysis in agricultural studies.

dcterms:description: Dynamic World provides near real-time global land use and land cover mapping at 10 m resolution, useful for agricultural monitoring.

dcterms:description: ESRI’s Land Cover dataset provides global land use and land cover data using Sentinel-2 imagery and deep learning techniques.

dcterms:description: ESA’s WorldCover dataset provides global land cover data at 10 m resolution, useful for agricultural applications.
